root: ^The flower found a floating water droplet.
^You cannot help but wonder what it does...

c-0: ^Flower's roots grow stronger and you gain the ability to jump!
c-1: ^You decide not to touch the water droplet...
^...but the flower does not care about what you think, and collects the droplet anyways.
^Flower's roots grow stronger and you gain the ability to jump!
